item.title: pwn2win: A Payload To Rule Them All
item.description: This one gives us a post endpoint for a payload that needs to exploit xxe, xss, and sqli (sql injection), as well as the code for the server. const express = require("express") const app = express() const bodyParser = require("body-parser") const port = 31337 const { execFile } = require("child_process") const fs = require("fs") const rateLimit = require("express-rate-limit"); app.use(express.static("static")) app.use(bodyParser.urlencoded({ extended: true })) const limiter = rateLimit({ windowMs: 10 * 60 * 1000, max: 50 }); // 15 minutes // limit each IP to 100 requests per windowMs app.
